titleStmt.title: A modest vindication of the Earl of S---------y in a letter to a friend concerning his being elected King of Poland.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Smith Bookseller in Chief to His Majesty Elect of Poland,

notesStmt.note: A satire upon the first Earl of Shaftesbury.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
